shows.title: The Great Bald Magician!
shows.desc:
As seen on Britain’s Got Talent, join El Baldiniho, the UK’s daftest magician, for some funny magic, silly props and stupid puns galore! Suitable for all ages.

El Baldiniho is perhaps Britain’s daftest magician, enjoying a meteoric rise to the middle end of the UK comedy scene!

shows.title: El Baldiniho’s Magic Workshop
shows.desc:
Learn to do amazing magic tricks and effects with everyday household objects, courtesy of the UK’s daftest magician. You’ll take home a bag full of simple tricks to perform for your family and friends.

El Baldiniho is perhaps Britain’s daftest magician, enjoying a meteoric rise to the middle end of the UK comedy scene!
